title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When using the Save As feature, the file is not saved with the same extension as the original. Instead, it is saved as a generic file with no specific file type. Additionally, the file icon changes from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original unless explicitly changed. The file icon should remain consistent with the parent java file icon.
SR:
1. Open a java file.
2. Select the Save As option.
3. Specify a new file name.
4. Click Save and observe that the file is saved with the same extension as the original and the file icon remains consistent with the parent java file icon.
